Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Big Rig
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A dedicated cargo transporter, the Big Rig is the epitome of bulk material transportation. While best suited on flat roads, it still has a powerful enough engine to effectively charge through difficult terrain.

A surprisingly quick, gas-guzzling cargo transporter that has terrible acceleration, but very little can slow it down once it gets up to speed.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
